body: Hi, names SlushItUp. Some call me Deadly from my old IGN. Just making this thread to see how dead or alive this forum is. I joined the server almost a year ago but i stopped playing after a few days, i joined back 2 days ago to see if i would enjoy it and i am, a lot... There's not much to tell about myself but i just want to see if this is a good community to interact with. Thanks.

title: Hola o/

replies.body: The forums is pretty much dead, but anyways welcome back!
